select d.tplakey, d.PARMVALKEY, d.ORGANKEY, d.organname, c.PARAM ,c.param2 from (select a.tplakey, a.PARMVALKEY, b.ORGANKEY, b.organname from T03_PARAM_ORG a, t00_organ b where 1=1
b.uporgankey = #organkey# ) d left join T03_PARAM_ORG_VAL c on d.ORGANKEY = c.ORGANKEY and d.PARMVALKEY = c.PARMVALKEY
d.parmvalkey = #parmvalkey#
d.tplakey = #tplakey#
order by ORGANKEY,ORGANNAME

select d.tplakey, d.PARMVALKEY, d.ORGANKEY, d.organname, c.PARAM ,c.param2 from (select a.tplakey, a.PARMVALKEY, b.ORGANKEY, b.organname from T03_PARAM_ORG a, t00_organ b where 1=1
b.organkey = #organkey# ) d left join T03_PARAM_ORG_VAL c on d.ORGANKEY = c.ORGANKEY and d.PARMVALKEY = c.PARMVALKEY
d.parmvalkey = #parmvalkey#
d.tplakey = #tplakey#

insert into T03_param_org_val( parmvalkey,tplakey,organkey,param,param2) select '$parmvalkey$', '$tplakey$', b.organkey, '$param$','$param2$' from t00_organ a, T00_ORGAN_DIM b where a.organkey=#organkey# and a.organkey=b.LEVEL_CODE_1

insert into T03_param_org_val( parmvalkey,tplakey,organkey,param,param2) select '$parmvalkey$', '$tplakey$', b.organkey, '$param$','$param2$' from t00_organ a, T00_ORGAN_DIM b where a.organkey=#organkey# and a.organkey=b.LEVEL_CODE_0 UNION SELECT '$parmvalkey$', '$tplakey$',ORGANKEY, '$param$','$param2$' FROM t00_organ where ORGANKEY = #organkey#
delete from T03_param_org_val where parmvalkey=#parmvalkey# and tplakey = #tplakey#

select * from T03_param_org_val d
d.parmvalkey = #parmvalkey#
d.tplakey = #tplakey#

select * from T03_param_org_val d
d.parmvalkey = #parmvalkey#
d.tplakey = #tplakey#
delete from T03_param_org_val where parmvalkey=#parmvalkey# and tplakey = #tplakey# and organkey in (select organkey from t00_organ where uporgankey = #organkey#)

insert into T03_param_org_val( parmvalkey,tplakey,organkey,param,param2) select '$parmvalkey$', '$tplakey$', b.organkey, '$param$','$param2$' from t00_organ a, T00_ORGAN_DIM b where a.organkey=#organkey# and a.organkey=b.LEVEL_CODE_2
